ErrorCode.name: WrongEventReceived
ErrorCode.description: Wrong type of Event has been received

ErrorCode.name: EventSubscriptionFailure
ErrorCode.description: Failed to subscribe to one or more events on a given channel

Member.name: EventName
Member.description: Event name for which subscription failed. Use '*' if the subscription attempt was for all events.

ErrorCode.name: PublishEventFailure
ErrorCode.description: An event could not be published

Member.name: EventName
Member.description: Name of the event that could not be sent.

Member.name: ChannelName
Member.description: Channel on which publish event failed.
